xyalign.xyalign module¶

xyalign.xyalign.bam_analysis_noprocessing()[source]¶

Runs bam analyis part of pipeline for unprocessed bam files

Returns a tuple containing two lists, one containing pandas dataframes with passing windows, and one containting pandas dataframes with failing windows

xyalign.xyalign.bam_analysis_postprocessing()[source]¶

Runs bam analyis part of pipeline for postprocessed bam files

Returns 0

xyalign.xyalign.parse_args()[source]¶

Parse command-line arguments

xyalign.xyalign.ploidy_analysis(passing_df, failing_df)[source]¶

Runs the ploidy analysis part of the pipeline. Takes passing_df and failing_df (the output of bam_analysis_noprocessing()) as input.

Returns a dictionary with results for each test.

xyalign.xyalign.ref_prep()[source]¶

Reference prep part of the pipeline

Returns a tuple with the two masked references (one with the y masked, ” “one with the y present”)

xyalign.xyalign.remapping()[source]¶

Runs remapping steps of the pipeline

Returns bam containing remapped sex chroms

xyalign.xyalign.swap_sex_chroms(new_bam_file)[source]¶
